a.title: Last Day of School: Early Out

div.div: Last Day of School: Early Out

div.p: Information on School Dismissal for Syracuse Arts Academy can be found here.

We would like to take this opportunity to officially welcome you to Syracuse Arts Academy. Syracuse Arts Academy strives to provide students with a safe, challenging, and individualized learning environment that will help them achieve their potential and become confident, competent, productive, and responsible young adults. Students will possess the knowledge, skills, attitude, and character necessary to succeed in all academic environments and ultimately in future careers and community settings.
Together we will make this year a rich and happy learning experience for everyone. We join with you in pledging the best educational opportunities for all children as they prepare themselves for the future.
Again, thank you for attending Syracuse Arts Academy!

div.div: 2893 W 1700 S, Syracuse, UT 84075 | Phone 801-784-5211 | Fax
